meanings.definition: Not capable of absorbing or soaking up.
meanings.sent1: The waterproof jacket is nonabsorptive, keeping me dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorptive surface of the table made it easy to clean up spills.
meanings.sent3: The sponge felt left out at the water party because it was nonabsorptive.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a nonabsorptive shield, deflecting negativity effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorptive material repelled any liquid that came near it.

meanings.sent1: The nonabsorptive fabric of the shirt kept me cool in the hot weather.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorptive nature of the soil caused the water to pool on the surface.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorptive sponge just stared blankly as the water dripped off it.
meanings.sent4: His nonabsorptive mind remained unaffected by the gossip around him.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorptive barrier blocked any attempt at infiltration.
